title: Trump administration 'pausing and reviewing' aid to Ukraine
shortDescription: Withholding aid is another sign that the relationship between the Trump administration and Ukrainian leadership has deteriorated.

title: 'We want to sound the alarm' Activists host program to counter Trump
shortDescription: As President Trump addresses Congress, organizers host a 24-hour livestream on what they call the negative impact of his polices.

title: Polish Cold War hero shares 'horror' at Trump's treatment of Zelenskyy
shortDescription: Nobel Peace Prize-winner Lech Walesa posted the letter, which was signed by 39 Polish former political prisoners, on Facebook on Monday.

title: Trump administration gave schools DEI ultimatum – then walked it back
shortDescription: The Trump administration gave schools two weeks to comply with a broad anti-DEI order. After the deadline, the Education Department walked it back.

title: Inmate sent to Oklahoma for federal execution in wake of Trump order
shortDescription: Hanson arrived in Oklahoma to face a likely execution by the state for his murder conviction. The Biden administration previously blocked the move.

title: Trump pick Linda McMahon confirmed by Senate to lead Education Dept.
shortDescription: The GOP-controlled Senate approved former wrestling industry executive Linda McMahon as the next secretary of the Education Department.

title: Fired federal workers to join Democrats at Trump's speech to Congress
shortDescription: Democrats are being asked to bring guests to Trump's Tuesday speech who have been harmed by the president's first weeks in office.

title: Melania Trump calls out 'toxic' online non-consensual sexual images
shortDescription: Melania Trump spoke out in favor of legislation that would criminalize the publication of non-consensual deepfake sexual images.

title: Tariffs on Canadian and Mexican imports begin on Tuesday: Trump
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said Monday that 25% tariffs on imports from Canada and Mexico will go into effect Tuesday, which could start a trade war.

title: Democratic governors recruit government workers laid off by Trump
shortDescription: Some Democratic governors are courting the newly unemployed federal employees fired by President Trump to come to work for state governments instead.

title: Will Trump's address to Congress have a 'designated survivor'?
shortDescription: The concept of a "designated survivor" has inspired intrigue and mystery for decades, even inspiring a TV show. But what does the role entail?

title: Zelenskyy says he is 'ready to sign' mineral deal after Trump clash
shortDescription: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said he was still open to a mineral deal after a clash with President Donald Trump in the Oval Office.

title: Elon Musk to attend President Trump's joint address to Congress
shortDescription: Elon Musk will attend President Trump's joint address to Congress on Tuesday night in another public display of his influence in the administration.

title: What to know before Trump’s joint session
shortDescription: This is what to know ahead of President Donald Trump's first joint session of Congress.

title: Kremlin says Trump's foreign policy 'largely coincides' with Russia's
shortDescription: A spokesman for Russian President Vladimir Putin praised President Trump's turn away from support for Ukraine's defense against Russia's invasion.

title: What to know about Democrat giving rebuttal after Trump's address
shortDescription: President Donald Trump will address a Joint Session of Congress Tuesday. Democrats have chosen Michigan Sen. Elissa Slotkin to deliver the rebuttal.

title: State of the Union? Not quite. What to know about Trump's speech.
shortDescription: Trump is expected to talk about what he's done since taking office and more. But the event will not technically be a State of the Union address.

title: Trump and Zelenskyy have heated exchange | The Excerpt

title: What time is Trump's address to Congress? How to watch, stream
shortDescription: Multiple media outlets, including USA TODAY and other major networks plan to stream or air live coverage of the address.

title: Trump speech to Congress likely to be 'imperial,' say analysts
shortDescription: U.S. President Donald Trump will address a joint session of Congress for the first time in his new term.
